title: Acting Secretary of Defense Patrick M. Shanahan to Brief at 9:30 a.m. on Tuesday, Jan 29.
content: Press AdvisoryRelease No: PA-004-19                                Acting Secretary of Defense Patrick M. Shanahan will conduct an off-camera press conference at 9:30 a.m. EST on Tuesday, Jan. 29, in the Pentagon Briefing Room (2E973).Both U.S. and foreign journalists without a Pentagon building pass must be pre-registered in the Pentagon Visitor Management System to attend this press conference; plan on being escorted from the River Entrance Pedestrian Bridge or the Pentagon Metro Entrance Facility only. Please arrive no later than 45 minutes before the briefing; have proof of affiliation and photo identification. Please call 703-697-5131 for any questions and escort into the building.
